column4: so...  can anyone go to private chat and help me figure out if my motherboard is ubuntu friendly?
you dont have to install it just test it out
you may have font rendering issues but for the most part yup
you can even run it in a vm
Virtual box allows you to install other operating systems without messing up your main one
think of it like you are running a guest operating system as a regular application
like you would Firefox or Internet explorer
Virtual Box is the application that you manage the Os guests from
they have documentation on the website two
They acquired Sun Micro a while ago
they have an agenda like any other corp
